sentences.sContent: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.sCn: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.sContent: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.sContent: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.sCn: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.sContent: ...The Yellow River is the third longest river in Asia and the sixth longest in the world...
...Changjiang is the longest river in Asia and the third longest in the world...

trans.tranOther: the largest continent with 60% of the earth's population; it is joined to Europe on the west to form Eurasia; it is the site of some of the world's earliest civilizations
